alert.note: Alert for Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Red Lodge Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:55PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL STILLWATER AND NORTHWESTERN CARBON COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM MDT... At 654 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Absarokee, or 16 miles northwest of Red Lodge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Joliet, Fromberg, Absarokee, Cooney Reservoir State Park, Edgar, Park City, Rockvale, Boyd, Roberts, and Silesia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
